StartHome: ^You don't know how long you've been floating.

s: ^I don't know how long I've been floating.

c-0: ^But you know that you can't stay here.

s: ^But I know that I can't stay here.

c-0: ^You open the door of your home.

s: ^I open the door to my home.

1stare: ^In the distance, a Being is still. They are looking towards you, but not with purpose.
approach: ^You stand in front of them, they don't react. You can hear them breathing.

c-0: ^They don't respond, their breathing quickens. You sense they can hear you.

s: ^"It's ok if you don't want to talk."
^Take it, and feed it to the being.

c-1: ^The being, for a brief moment, looks hopeful. But then nothing happens.

push: ^The being provides no resistance, they hit the ground. You hear their skull crack open.

s: ^Try not to let it phase you.
^"I can stay with you, until you're ready to talk with me."

c-0: ^The being doesn't move at all, the sobbing has ended.

c-1: ^You conclude that this being isn't worth any more of your time.
^You conclude that this being isn't worth any more of your time.

c-2: ^You conclude that this being isn't worth any more of your time.

dead: ^You stare at the body, it looks like they have a potion in their hand.

c-0: ^As you reach down, you hear the beings last breath.
c-1: ^You killed them, it was your fault.

leave2: ^After all this time, you leave without saying a word.

c-0: ^The bodies have no signs of damage, except for a single rock lodged into each of their skulls.
^You notice that some of them are looking at you.
^They look like they don't recognize you.

c-1: ^You step back. The Being looks surprised. "DON'T MOVE!"
^You turn and run. You feel a rock impact into your back, it hurts but doesn't slow you down.

convo2: ^"This is my land, and you're not allowed in."

c-0: ^"You see this line, this is my land's border, if you cross it I will kill you."
^"So I recommend you turn, and start walking."

s: ^"What right do you have to this land?"

c-1: ^"ONE MORE WORD AND I'LL KILL  YOU!"
^You take a single step over the line.

MovingOn: ^As you walk along side the line, the being stays in place, they shout "Don't stop until you find the end."

c-0: ^You do as they say...for a long time...but then you get bored.
^You take a step across the line, nothing happens. You continue on as normal.
^You take a step across the line, the being is too far away, nothing happens. You continue on as normal.

c-5: ^Eventually, a being removes the rock from your skull, and feeds you a potion.

c-0: ^The being apologises for hurting you, all that time ago.

Laughing: ^Two Beings are laughing with each other. Everytime they look at you they howl louder.

c-2: ^As you run away, you hear aggressive giggling.

Friends: ^Before you can speak, one of the beings turns towards you. "Hi friend, how has your day been so far?"

c-0: ^"My day, yes, I would have, say, it was the same,very, pretty good day."

g-0: ^They're both laughing so hard they don't hear you.

funny: ^"Oh, it's nothing, we just saw you in the distance, talking with that other being, and.."

c-0: ^"It's nothing, really. It wasn't funny. I'm sorry."

s: ^"You can tell me, I can handle it."

c-0: ^"Oh no, he'll punch me, he'll punch me." The other being is sucking in their cheeks.

Turtlefollower: ^In the distance, you see a tower.

c-0: ^The tower is so tall, it looks like it extends forever.

almost: ^As the tower draws closer, you notice giant limbs jut out, some look like they're trying to swim.
jab: ^Something jabs at your foot, you look to see a small being.

c-0: ^"Are you going to talk to the final turtle?"
^"The final turtle of turtle tower, he's a smart one, I have so much to learn from him."

s: ^"Oh, yes, I am going to talk to him."

c-1: ^You lightly kick the being to the ground, they look unharmed. "Fine, be like that then."

goodgood: ^"Good Good, I talk so much with him, whenever I can. Inbetween the tasks he sets for me and his other followers of course."

s: ^"Will he ask me to do something?"

c-0: ^"Depends, most of his followers give up on him eventually, so he might not bother anymore."

s: ^"Doesn't sound like that good a leader."

c-0: ^"It is inevitable for people to give, we all live so long down here. I haven't seen anyone die."
c-1: ^"I don't know, I think I'm just more committed."

godowhat: ^"Then what are you going to do."

s: ^"I'm going to climb him, and then the entire tower."
^"I want to see what happens when he dies."

c-0: ^The being looks visibly hurt. "Everyone is entitled to their opinions".
c-1: ^"Well, not to be a buzzkill, but I already know what happens."

c-0: ^"Well, then the next one falls on top of it.

s: ^"So? I only care about the current one."

c-1: ^"You must be new to this world, huh. Well if you're going to be like that, I would advise you don't think about it any more than you are currently."
^"I don't know, I just know that when I've seen Being think, they tend to...die."
^The being looks around nervously. They change the subject
^"hmmm, interesting, I should try that next time I see him"
c-2: ^The being chuckles. "Everyone needs a hobby I guess."

Givehimthishurt: ^"In any case, when you reach him, can you give him this?"

c-0: ^"It's very important to me if you give this to him"

s: ^"Didn't you hear me when I said I was going to kill him."

c-0: ^"I know, I know, but in case you change your mind."

GivehimThis: ^"In any case, when you reach him, can you give him this?"

c-0: ^"I'm so much smaller than you, It'll take me forever to reach him."

Turtle: ^As you approach the tower, you find that it is made of many turtles stacked on top of each other. They all appear to be asleep, apart from the final turtle, who is humming quietly to themself. They can't see you.
approachT: ^"Hello, nice to meet you..." The turtle is friendly, and has a few scars across its face.

c-1: ^The turtle looks surprised "I'm. ok. Thanks for asking, how are you?"

c-0: ^"I don't really understand either. I just know we've always been this way."

s: ^"How come you all haven't fallen over yet?"

c-1: ^"I'm sorry to hear that. You're real to me."

s: ^"Could you give me something to do."
^"I've been alive for so long, but I feel like I've learnt nothing."

c-0: ^The turtle looks nervous "I would say it's best not to think about it."
c-1: ^"I know, I try to remember that they're just trying to cope with...all this."

s: ^"Could you give me something to do?"

AskClimb: ^The turtle's eye twitches, "I wouldn't recommend it."

s: ^"But you would allow me to do it?"

c-0: ^Another eye twitch, "Whenever a being of your kind attempts to climb to the summit, they eventually fall down."

s: ^"What if I promise not to fall."

c-0: ^The turtle takes a nervous breath "Um, just...think about it...ok."
^The turtle relaxes "Sorry, I didn't know if...please don't hurt yourself."

c-1: ^"I can't stop you"...The turtle looks off into the distance.

s: ^"Could you give me something else to do?"

c-0: ^You ignore the turtle and start to climb onto its shell, the turtle starts to quietly cry.

climb: ^You manage to climb up on its shell

g-0: ^The turtle speaks. "You know I can feel you right?"

s: ^Climb down and talk to the turtle.

c-2: ^"I don't mind, seriously, but if you continue to climb, know that some of the other turtles will try to throw you off."

s: ^Get down and talk to the turtle.

g-0: ^"Ok, well, I guess I can't stop you, Can I give you just one piece of advice?"
g-1: ^"Make sure you climb high enough so that the fall will kill you. The alternative is quite upsetting."

c-0: ^"Good choice, my friend, Good choice. Come round to see me and we can talk."

ClimbTalk: ^"Hello, nice to meet you." The turtle is friendly, and has many scars across it's face.

g-0: ^"Just so we start on the right foot, could I ask you why you wanted to..climb..us."

s: ^"I wanted to see what's at the top."

c-1: ^"hmm, well, you can still find challenges without putting yourself in danger."

s: ^"Could you give me a goal then?"

c-2: ^The turtle eyes widen. "I'm sorry, that you felt that way, not that I can blame you, there isn't much to do down here."

s: ^Clarify that you just thought it would be fun.

c-1: ^"It is difficult, living down here, but that doesn't mean you can't find something to do."

c-3: ^"Would it deter any future attempts if I said that there's nothing much up there. Just more turtles."

s: ^"I still want to check for myself."

c-0: ^"Every so often, the weight of the tower crushs the turtle at the bottom, so I used to be alot higher up."

s: ^"You must be in a lot of pain, with all those turtles on your back."

c-0: ^"A turtle crush only happens once in an infinity, so I'm not too worried."
c-1: ^"You get used to it. Thank you for your concern."

s: ^"Could you give me something to do?"

ContinueToClimb: ^You Continue to climb up the tower of turtles. Eventually you...

c-0: ^It takes forever, but you eventually reach the top.
c-1: ^It climb forever, but you eventually fall off.

c-0: ^"Well, if you want to survive down here for as long as the others have, you can't take risks like that."
^"Since Beings live forever, the only way they can die is by being killed. Which means that if a Being takes any risk, they will eventually be killed by it."

s: ^"How do you survive for a long time down here?"

c-1: ^"It's difficult, but because I'm pinned down by the weight of the tower, I don't have a choice but to continue."

s: ^"Have you seen what other beings do?"

c-1: ^"The Beings that decide to stay around seem to invent hobbies for themselves, keep themselves busy.Distracted."

c-0: ^"I've always been, so it's a little different."

s: ^"If you've always been...where did I come from?"

c-0: ^"I don't know, but it is true."
c-1: ^"I don't know, quite honestly I'm surprised that anything else lives down here."

goals: ^"I don't know, I've given tasks to Beings like you before. It never ends well."

c-0: ^"They complete them too quickly, then it's back to asking me for things I can't give them."

s: ^"Could you just give me an impossible goal then, so I don't return."

c-0: ^"I've tried that before, eventually the Being convinces themselves that they did complete the task, even when they haven't."

s: ^"That reminds me, a small being told me to give you this."

s: ^"They seemed to speak highly of you."

s: ^I would rather walk forever than go back.

enerfun: ^But for how long should I stay?

Trader1: ^A being approaches you, they seem eager to talk.

c-0: ^"I want to help you, that's all." The being tries to hide a nervous smile.

c-1: ^"I'm not implying that you do, but since I'm offering, why not hear me out?"
^"As you wish. If you change your mind, I'll be here."

c-0: ^The being eyes light up, surprises of how easy it was.

why: ^"Helping people is a good thing to do, wouldn't you agree?"

c-0: ^"...and would you also agree that helping people that help you is good."
^The being is getting more excited. "Excellent, my friend, I have a proposition for you" they take a nervous breath. "
c-1: ^"I see you are a Being of nuance, how very unique." Their smile is strained...

c-0: ^"I am not so nuanced, for me, I help even those who have yet to help me."

c-1: ^"Perhaps if I explain myself, I can convince you?"

TradeExplain: ^I want to give what you desire, and in return, I want to take what you no-longer need."

s: ^"If you want to help, why do I need to give you something?"

c-0: ^Their eyes light up, "So you're aware of my practice."

s: ^"Yes, but I see no reason why I should participate."

c-0: ^Their eyes dull slightly, "Perhaps I shall convince you."
^"I see, maybe it would be better for me to answer any questions you might have."
c-1: ^"I see you need time to think about it, I'll let you be on your way."
^They can't quite seem to believe it, "Right away, friend, right away."
^"Taking what you no longer need is my reward."

s: ^"I'm interested, but I have some questions."

c-0: ^The being smiles. "Perhaps if you allow me to describe my offers to you, then you can decide for yourself."

c-1: ^"I see you need time to think about it, I'll let you be on your way."
^"Yes of course, I will try my best to answer them"

c-2: ^"Don't worry, many beings similar to yourself have struggled to understand as well, do you have any questions"

s: ^"I don't want to engage with this activity."

c-0: ^"If we all focused on trading things, this world will become a better place."
c-1: ^The being looks nervious. "Friend, I want to help you, answering that will not help. Please."
c-2: ^The trader's eyes light up. "yes, yes we can!"
c-3: ^"I will respect your wishes my friend. But could you allow me to make one last suggestion."

c-0: ^"Why not just a trial run? You don't have much to lose? I'll even immediately give you 100 kneecaps."

c-1: ^"I see you need time to think about it, I'll let you be on your way."
^"I see you need time to think about it, I'll let you be on your way."

Ignore: ^You do not turn to face them. As you walk past them you sense their presence on your shoulder.
